techmeme.title: Sources: more than a year before the election, TikTok execs revamped moderation rules and trust and safety staff to make TikTok more appealing to Trump fans (The Information)
LG Display shows off a stretchable display prototype that can expand by up to 50%, more than doubling the previous record of 20% elongation (Jowi Morales/Tom's Hardware)
iOS 18.2 public beta introduces Share Item Location, letting users share a link with the location of AirTags or Find My accessories with airlines and others (Emma Roth/The Verge)
Bitcoin passes $85K, a new record, adding almost $20K in under a week; Tesla is up 7%+ today, while Meta, Apple, Nvidia, Amazon, and Microsoft are down slightly (James Van Straten/CoinDesk)
Argentina-based fintech Ualá, which has 8M users, raised a $300M Series E led by Allianz X at a $2.75B valuation, after raising $350M at $2.45B in August 2021 (Bloomberg)
